General.Name: Gwangjushinseg
General.Description: Gwangju Shinsegae. Co. ,Ltd. operates department stores under the E-Mart name in South Korea. The company was formerly known as Gwangju Shinsegae Department Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gwangju Shinsegae Co., Ltd. in 2006. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Gwangju, South Korea. Gwangju Shinsegae. Co. ,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Shinsegae Inc.
